greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Number of length n primitive (aperiodic) palindromes with integer entries that cover an initial interval of positive integers.
link: Andrew Howroyd, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..200
program: (PARI) a(n) = {if(n<1, n==0, sumdiv(n, d, moebius(n/d)*sum(k=1, ceil(d/2), k!*stirling(ceil(d/2), k, 2))))}
results.author: _Andrew Howroyd_, Sep 28 2019
